post.date: Posted: Mon Feb 06, 2006 4:03 pm Post subject: LW 8.5 obj read error problem ?!
post.author: aph0x``
post.body:
Hi

Perhaps you know the export to obj button in the d3/q4radiant ... where you can save your geoemtry in an obj file to load it later in lightwave.

This thing was working fine for me but now perhaps since i updated lw to 8.5 from 8.3.. its no more able to read my exported obj map geometry!!

What is going wrong? Should i take 8.3 or is there a new method in 8.5 to get this obj files loaded, terrain making for q4 is no fun without this method :[ so pls help me

c
y
a

<edit< damn ... it was a buggy windows driver configuration :] my hdd was on PIO mode ... ... :I
